tasks.title: Design Landing Page Layout
tasks.description: Create a visually appealing and user-friendly layout for the landing page.

tasks.title: Develop Email Capture Form
tasks.description: Implement a form to collect visitor email addresses securely.

tasks.title: Create 20% Coupon Offer
tasks.description: Design and integrate a 20% discount coupon to be offered upon email submission.

tasks.title: Set Up Email Automation
tasks.description: Configure automated emails to send the 20% coupon to users after they submit their email.

tasks.title: Test Landing Page Functionality
tasks.description: Perform thorough testing to ensure the landing page, form, and coupon delivery work correctly.

tasks.title: Deploy Landing Page
tasks.description: Publish the landing page to a live environment and ensure it is accessible to users.

tasks.title: Implement Responsive Design
tasks.description: Ensure the landing page is responsive and looks good on all devices, including desktops, tablets, and smartphones.

tasks.title: Optimize for SEO
tasks.description: Incorporate SEO best practices to improve the landing page's visibility in search engine results.

tasks.title: Test User Experience
tasks.description: Conduct user testing to gather feedback on the landing page's design, usability, and effectiveness.

tasks.title: Launch Landing Page
tasks.description: Deploy the landing page to the web and ensure all elements are functioning correctly.

tasks.title: Monitor Performance
tasks.description: Track the landing page's performance using analytics tools to measure engagement and conversion rates.
